body.text: Meter will be supplied by the party & will be tested by the Deptt. with usual testing fee.
W/s. line is to be disconnected.
This is applicable on conversion of temporary connection to permanent water supply connection.
The connection will be allowed only from a distribution main.

columns.text: INSTRUCTIONS
A.The Odisha Water Works Rule 1980 and its subsequent amendments shall be binding on the party.

B.After issue of sanction,the party shall fix up programme of connection for water supply with the Officer in charge of water works. The ferrule shall be fixed being duly stamped by the approved seal of the department and water supply connection allowed in the presence of the Sub-Divisional officer or any of the officer authorised by him.

C.In case of water connection involving road cutting,necessary permission from the appropriate authorities has to be obtained by the party to restore the road to its original condition at his/her cost.
D.The consumer has to arrange all materials including pipes,fitting meter etc. and labour at his own cost for taking connection.

E.Pipe with proper concrete encasing shall have to be provided by the party at the place where pipe crosses any drain or passes through a place of contamination. First class materials shall have to be used in such work.

F.The consumer has to fixup a meter (duly tested by sub-divisional officer on request and deposit of necessary fees) and has to provide one masonry meter chamber as per standard P.H. drawing /design and specification on the pipe line at his cost.

G.No consumer shall alter,extend,make addition or dislocate any part of the installation provided inside or outside the premises without prior permission of the concerned Executive Engineer or Officer-in-charge of water works. Penalty will be imposed in case of any deviation.

H.No guarantee can be given for supply of adequate quantity of water maintaining sufficient pressure in the main and against any break down of supply on any account. No exception or concession shall be given or claims entertained on any of the above grounds.

I.In case the meter is out of order, the water charges shall be calculated on the basis if the storage capacity as well as average of last 12 months reading of meter which ever is applicable to particular cases and acceptable to the department.
Officer in-charge water works
Forwarded to Sri/Smt {{connectionHolderName}}

Officer in-charge water works
Copy to the sub-divisional officer for
information.Necessary water supply connection may be affected within a period of one month
from the date of this sanction order.The physical verification report (PVR) sheet enclosed
herewith may be suitably filled up duly signed by the consumer/his representative on the date
of connection and may please be transmitted to Officer-in-charge water works for further
necessary action at this end.
Officer in-charge water works
